tool_description: Evaluates skin reactivity patterns and sensitivity triggers to determine tolerance levels.

reaction_frequency.description: Number of product reactions in past 6 months (0-10)

recovery_time.description: Typical hours needed for skin to recover from reactions (1-168)

environmental_sensitivity.description: Whether skin reacts to weather/environmental changes

fragrance_tolerance.description: Response to fragranced products: tolerates, sometimes_reacts, always_reacts

patch_test_results.description: Results from dermatologist patch testing if available

error_messages: Invalid reaction frequency: Must be integer between 0-10.
Invalid trigger list: common_triggers array can contain 0-15 string items.
Invalid reaction types: reaction_types array can contain 0-10 string items.
Invalid recovery time: Must be integer between 1-168 hours.
Invalid fragrance tolerance: Must be one of [tolerates, sometimes_reacts, always_reacts].
Invalid sun sensitivity: Must be integer between 5-120 minutes.
Inconsistent sensitivity data: High reaction frequency should correlate with multiple triggers.
usage: Document all skin reactions from the past 6 months, including triggers and reaction types. Assess sun sensitivity based on unprotected exposure time before burning.
